entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json, json_netty, plaintext_nodejs #43197
  • `bind:after` with asynchronous method causes multiple renders when done. #43195
  • Update Blazor WebAssembly template to include comment linking to doc about enabling cross-origin isolation #43194
    7.0-rc1
  • Full chain support followup #43193
    7.0-rc2
  • Allow non-attribute routing for ApiController #43192
  • <base href="/" /> or base-tag alternative for Blazor MVC integration. #43191
  • Cannot add `scoped` AuthorizationHandler in .NET 7 Preview 7 #43188
  • The "ProcessFrameworkReferences" task failed unexpectedly. #43186

Closed

  • Add overload with `AuthenticationProperties` to `SignInManager.ExternalLoginSignInAsync` #43138
  • Net 6 Blazor server application::Failed to start the transport 'WebSockets': Error: WebSocket failed to connect. The connection could not be found on the server, either the endpoint may not be a SignalR endpoint, the connection ID is not present on the server, or there is a proxy blocking WebSockets. If you have multiple servers check that sticky sessions are enabled. #43175
  • OCSP Stapling support for Kestrel #4762
    7.0-rc1
  • LeakTrackingObjectPool does not report leaks because it only throws in Microsoft's own debug builds #42524
    7.0-rc1
  • Flaky Various Blazor Template timeouts/failures #30882
    7.0-rc2
  • Areas do not work in ASP.NET Core with Angular project #38354
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem using Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets with spaces in outputpath #38702
    .NET 7 Planning
  • For Blazor WebAssembly (hosted), consider enabling cross-origin isolation by default #42114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Node.js processes *still* don't quit after stopping debugging #38897
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Building package.json with ClientAssets results in 404 Not Found #38898
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `browser-refresh.js` not found at `localhost` when using remote debugging #38946
    .NET 7 Planning
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularFetchData_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Fetch Data" page #42368
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularCounter_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Counter" page #42366
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularHome_AI4W: No main landmark is defined on the "Home" page #42341
    7.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Handle _GlobalPropertiesToRemoveFromProjectReferences in the SDK #43067
    7.0-rc1
  • System.Runtime error #43115
  • MSB4096: "StaticWebAsset" does not define a value for metadata "AssetKind" #43134
  • Missing IRouteHandlerFilter in preview 7 #43185
  • Perf improvement: https #43052
  • ApplicationBuilder.ServerFeatures nullable issue #43036
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Dynamic include DataProtectionKey.Id #43204
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • Reduce state machine in AuthorizationMiddlewareResultHandler #43200
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Revert Dispose in IIS tests #43199
    area-runtime
  • Fixed the license value for the jquery-validation-unobtrusive repo #43196
    area-security
  • HTTP/3: Test abort at end of request #43183
    area-runtime
  • Fix MVC form data binding localization #43182
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Store Task of IAuthorizationHandler #43198
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Update baseline, merge from internal #43173
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.36
  • Add more info to UnrecognizedMediaType #43100
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Add comment about QueryString in more places #43179
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Accessibility focus fixes #43177
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • ApplicationBuilder server features defaults to empty collection #43184
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Delete StartupExceptionHandler #43153
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Cache effective policy in endpoint metadata #43124
    area-security, api-suggestion
  • Updating HttpMethodMetadata based on ICorsMetadata #43077
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync output cache with API review #43121
    area-runtime
  • Consolidate error pages used by ANCM and improve link #43170
    area-runtime
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add FileDownloader service for Blazor apps #43076
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • RateLimitingMiddleware updates #43053
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
